game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost artifact from the Forgotten Temple
game.description: A priceless artifact has been stolen from the royal treasury. Rumors suggest it's hidden somewhere in the Forgotten Temple. Your task is to retrieve it.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a rare weapon

tasks.description: Use your map to find the Forgotten Temple hidden deep within the forest
Clear the Forgotten Temple of its undead protectors
Fortified in the inner sanctum of the temple is the lost artifact. Retrieve it.
